0-25.label: Offline
0-25.guidance: Acknowledge that they may feel like they just can't think or access their usual brainpower; advise postponing big decisions, sticking to simple tasks, and giving themselves extra mental rest.

25-50.label: Distracted
25-50.guidance: Name that their thoughts keep jumping around; suggest reducing multitasking, cutting distractions, and writing things down so nothing important slips.

50-75.label: On Point
50-75.guidance: Highlight that their thinking is reliable and focused; good moment for planning, problem-solving, and clear conversations.

75-100.label: Crystal Clear
75-100.guidance: Emphasize very strong clarity and insight; encourage tackling complex decisions or deep work they've been putting off.

description.overview: Mind represents your cognitive sharpness, ability to concentrate, and ease of expressing yourself.
description.detailed: This group combines three mental functions: Clarity (how clearly you think), Focus (your ability to concentrate), and Communication (how easily you express ideas). Together they show whether your mind is sharp and flowing or foggy and scattered. High scores mean you're thinking clearly, staying focused, and communicating effectively. Low scores suggest mental fog, distractions, or difficulty finding words.

quiet.challenging: Your mind needs rest - let it recover now so it's sharper tomorrow
quiet.mixed: Mental activity is subtle today - honor the quiet, ideas will come
quiet.harmonious: Your mind is peacefully still - enjoy the calm clarity

mild.challenging: Mental fog is real but lifting - give it until afternoon and you'll think clearer
mild.mixed: Thoughts are gentle but present - trust the slow processing
mild.harmonious: Mental energy flows easily - your thinking is reliable today

moderate.challenging: Mental obstacles are there but you can work through them - take one thing at a time
moderate.mixed: Your mind is pulled in multiple directions - pick one priority and the rest will wait
moderate.harmonious: Mental clarity is strong - this is your window for decisions that matter

high.challenging: Mental load is intense - but you handle pressure well. Simplify and focus on what's essential
high.mixed: Your mind is racing in all directions - channel that into creative work, not decisions
high.harmonious: Peak mental sharpness - tackle the complex stuff you've been putting off

extreme.challenging: Mental overload is real - simplify ruthlessly. You'll get through this by doing less, better
extreme.mixed: Maximum mental energy, chaotic but brilliant - capture ideas now, sort them later
extreme.harmonious: Your mind is exceptionally sharp - big decisions and complex problems are your playground today
